_sText:
zm\_hotline\_miami by Soft Serve (a.k.a. Satin Storm)

Features:

- Floor 1: Strip club, dressing room, TV room, restaurant, kitchen, warehouse, toilets
- Floor 2: Lodging
- Floor 3: Indoor pool, showers, VIP room, security room
- Floor 4: Rooftop pool with diving board, boss office
- Two underground floors with an interrogation room, garage, small office
- Music
- Secrets
